page.title: 15FARMS
page.content: { Holford Farm,Condovers Farm,Goshems {Farm,Gunhill Farm,Biggin Farm,Marsh {Farm and Manor Farm.} Holford Farm is about one mile up the road from West Tilbury and has the normal kind of{animals}( cows, pigs,chickens,ducks,horses etc.) Condovers Farm is also just down the road from West Tilbury but in the opposite direction,it is a{poultry farm and its name has been changed to Walnut Tree Farm.Goshems Farm and Gunhill Farm are mostly{arable farms,and so are Biggins, Marsh and Manor farms. Many of the arable farms have some cows or sheep as well.
